title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama LLM & embeddings to LangChain with one import.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Drop-in ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; no API keys, runs locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and POJO responses.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning any Ollama model into inline Copilot-style assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (cuda/rocm/cpu) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template pre-wired to Ollama REST API; one-click Vercel deploy.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to any Ollama model and writes back results.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama with optional CUDA & ROCm accelerators.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from OAS; chat, generate, pull, embed.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.
